publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-958 Donald Gorrie: Appointment of a New Controller of BBC Scotland-That the Parliament congratulates Ken MacQuarrie on his appointment as the new Controller of BBC Scotland and looks forward to co-operating with him in developing Scottish cultural activity, good quality entertainment and political commentary and the reporting of the many good parts of Scottish life.

S2M-958 Donald Gorrie: Appointment of a New Controller of BBC Scotland-That the Parliament congratulates Ken MacQuarrie on his appointment as the new Controller of BBC Scotland and looks forward to co-operating with him in developing Scottish cultural activity, good quality entertainment and political commentary and the reporting of the many good parts of Scottish life. *The member has provided the following Gaelic translation: Fastadh Stiùiriche ùr do BhBC Alba - Gu bheil a' Phàrlamaid a' cur meal a naidheachd air Coinneach MacGuaire air an obair ùir aige mar Stiùiriche BBC Alba agus gu bheil i a' dèanamh fiughair ri bhith ag obrachadh còmhla ris ann an bhith a' leasachadh cultar na h-Alba le sàr phrògraman taitneach agus deagh aithrisean air poileataigs agus air an iomadh rud math ann am beatha na h-Alba.*
S2M-958 Appointment of a New Controller of BBC Scotland (lodged on 25 February 2004) Nora Radcliffe*
S2M-958 Appointment of a New Controller of BBC Scotland (lodged on 25 February 2004) Karen Gillon*
